    • Method Detail

      • getChatHistory

        public java.util.ArrayList<TextMessage> getChatHistory()
        Retrieve the chat history of this response. NOTE: Must check requetType before accessing this method
        Returns:
        The chat history contained in this response.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if original request was not for CONTACT_CHAT_HISTORY

      • getOriginalRequest

        public BlueTextRequest getOriginalRequest()
        Get the original BlueTextRequest that this object is a response to.

      • getBatteryLevel

        public int getBatteryLevel()
        Retrieve the battery level of the phone. NOTE: Must check requetType before accessing this method.
        Returns:
        The battery level of the phone (1-100)
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if original request was not for BATTERY_PERCENTAGE

      • getImageResource

        public java.lang.Object getImageResource()
        Get the image resource for the contact's picture. NOTE: Must check requetType before accessing this method.
        Returns:
        1: If a photo was located for the contact, returns byte[]
        2: If a facebook profile picture was located, returns String
        3: If no photo is associated with this contact, returns null
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if original request was not for CONTACT_PICTURE
